title: PLD Space calls first launch a success
summary: Spanish launch vehicle startup PLD Space declared their first suborbital launch a success, clearing the way for development of an orbital launch vehicle.

title: Space Development Agency awards York Space $615 million contract for 62 satellites
summary: The Space Development Agency has awarded York Space a $615 million contract for 62 satellites for DoD’s low Earth orbit constellation.

title: Pakistan becomes latest country to join China’s ILRS moon project
summary: Pakistan officially joined China’s International Lunar Research Station, the China National Space Administration announced Friday.

title: Canada’s budget boost for Radarsat is part of its climate strategy
summary: Canada’s newly announced plan to invest 1 billion Canadian dollars ($739 million)  over the next 15 years in the Radarsat mission is part of the federal government’s climate resilience strategy. […]

title: Why NASA’s return to the Moon will likely succeed this time
summary: For the first time in six decades, geopolitics and deep-space exploration align.
